However, I don't have any specific information about the current weather in Belagavi. 

But I can suggest some general weather conditions for you based on the time and location. 

Belagavi, being a city in the state of Karnataka, India, has a tropical savanna climate. 

Considering the current time, which is 18 hours, 47 minutes, and 50 seconds on September 11, 2025, it is likely that Belagavi is experiencing pleasant weather with moderate temperatures.

The average high temperature in Belagavi during this time of the year is around 29°C (84°F), while the average low temperature is around 20°C (68°F).

As for the current weather conditions, I would recommend checking a reliable weather forecasting website or app for the most up-to-date information.
